about_the_game:
M.E.M.O demo (α)

Welcome to M.E.M.O demo (α) where you can get a sneak peek into the world of "M.E.M.O"!

While some features are yet to be implemented in this version, you can already experience the captivating world setting and core cryptography gameplay that makes "M.E.M.O" special.

※Please have paper and pen ready when playing.

※The full demo version is scheduled for release in July 2025.

※This demo may differ from the final product.

name: M.E.M.O Demo(α test)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2080ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: M.E.M.O demo (α).Experience the game's unique world setting and core cryptography gameplay.
